common.contactDescription: Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to connect, I'm always happy to hear from you. Drop me a message, and I'll be in touch soon!
common.name: Name

hero.name: Zuleny Cruz Rodriguez
hero.description: Software Developer with product vision, focused on efficiency and building high-impact systems.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Software Developer with 3+ years of experience across the full application lifecycle, with a strong focus on Backend development, Databases, and designing System Architectures (Microservices/Monolithic). I also possess knowledge and experience in Frontend (React, Flutter) to provide a comprehensive approach to development.
about.paragraph2: I deliver value by building effective and sustainable solutions, such as developing essential GPS decoders currently utilized by over 300 active devices in the fleet, demonstrating high proficiency in high-impact systems.

centurysoft.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Developed and implemented over 200 new GPS frame decoding protocols, successfully integrating more than 200 new devices.
Optimized event logging and notification delivery (push, WhatsApp, email, SMS), significantly reducing delivery time.
Restructured and refactored all reports to improve code efficiency and organization.
Reduced Google Maps API consumption by 80% using a caching mechanism, leading to a significant decrease in requests.

getserver.title: Jr. Full Stack Developer
achievements: Collaborated in the development and implementation of web applications for the education, logistics, and e-commerce sectors.
Developed a web application for registration management and a mobile app for antivirus license sales.
Reduced critical report loading times by 50% in a note management application.

centurysoftIntern.title: Development and Support Internship
achievements: Developed new functionalities for three web platforms and a socket service, contributing to system stability.

gpsDecoder.title: GPS Decoder System
gpsDecoder.description: Developed and implemented over 200 GPS frame decoding protocols, successfully integrating more than 200 new devices. This system is currently utilized by over 300 vehicles, demonstrating high proficiency in high-impact systems.

mediaManagement.title: Media Management Platform
mediaManagement.description1: This project aimed to tackle the complexities of media planning across diverse channels, where challenges such as errors and compliance issues frequently arise. These hurdles often result in time-consuming tasks and potential regulatory risks, diverting attention away from strategic thinking and creative endeavours.
mediaManagement.description2: Our objective was to streamline the media planning process, minimizing errors and ensuring compliance, allowing teams to focus on strategic decision-making and creativity.

smileAnalysis.title: Smile Analysis Web Application
smileAnalysis.description1: Developed and deployed a smile detection application for elderly residents in Japanese old age homes using computer vision and machine learning algorithms.
smileAnalysis.description2: Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface using Angular with Flask backend to analyze smiles in real-time.

diploma1.institution: Graduate School of Engineering UAGRM University
